intro lead: Welcome to lib.reviews! We're building a free and open platform for reviewing absolutely anything, in any language.
intro message:
Why? Because we believe the world's reviews should be organized by a community, not for profit, without ads, and with a strong commitment to integrity and quality. We also believe in separating reviews from the people offering you the thing that you're reviewing, to reduce conflicts of interest.

Right now we're working on the code. Here are a few things you can do:
to do list:
• Create an account and write a review. Reviews will only show up in the feed for now, and you can't do fancy things like uploading images or adding metadata yet.
  • Work on any of our open issues
  • Liberate your existing reviews using freeyourstuff.cc
  • Join our discussion list and share your thoughts about this project
find us on: You can find us on GitHub, on Twitter and on IRC (#libreviews on irc.freenode.net).
papers please: Welcome back! Please provide your login credentials below.
no account yet: Don't have an account yet? Registration is quick and easy.
enter your info: Welcome to the lib.reviews community! Please enter the information for your new account below.
already got an account: Already have an account? Sign in instead.
agree to terms:
By registering an account, you agree to the terms of use. In concrete terms:
  • We do not tolerate harassment, spam, abuse, trolling, or illegal content.
  • You agree to publish your contributions under appropriate free licenses.
Please read the complete terms of use, which are intended to be human-readable.
need username: You need to provide a username.
need password: You need to provide a password.
bad username: We don't know a user with this name.
welcome new user: Thank you for registering a lib.reviews account, %s! We hope you like the place and decide to stick around for a while.
already logged in: Please note that you're already logged in. Please don't create more than one account per person, unless it is for clearly distinguished roles (e.g., professional vs. personal).
invalid email format: "%s" does not appear to be a valid email address.
invalid username characters: The username must not contain any of the following characters: %s
unknown error: Sorry - an unknown error occurred. This problem has been logged.
username too long: The username is too long (max %s characters).
email too long: The email address is too long (max %s characters).
password too short: The password is too short. For your security, please pick a password with at least %s characters.
username exists: We already have a user with this name.
pick any url:
We use web addresses (URLs) as the primary way to identify things we review. Pick any web address that describes the place/object/thing you're reviewing, e.g. an official website, the address for the item on a shop website, or any other URL that identifies it.

The community will merge reviews that are describing the same thing (check out the feed to help!).
title: Title
enter title: Enter a title, e.g.: Amazing waterfalls, but very crowded
pick a title:
A good headline will tell readers what the most important takeaways from your review are.

Don't bury the lede — for example, if a product broke after 3 months, or if a restaurant gave you food poisoning, you'll probably want to mention it here! :-)
write your review:
Write your review in plain text, or use markdown for formatting. A few things to keep in mind:
  • Be fair — please be careful with generalizations, positive or negative.
  • Be honest — that includes disclosing any conflicts of interest of your own (e.g., if you work for a competitor).
  • Be kind — this website is used by humans.
There is no length requirement, but star ratings without any explanation may be deleted.
select rating: Here's how we use star ratings:<ul><li>1 star: terrible/to be avoided<li>2 stars: flawed/of limited value<li>3 stars: acceptable/okay<li>4 stars: pretty good/recommended<li>5 stars: really good/perfect.
new review terms: By publishing your review, you agree to the terms of use, including licensing your review under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike License.
draft loaded: Previous unpublished draft loaded from your browser.
not a url: This doesn't look like a web address (example: https://www.gnu.org/).
signin required: You have to sign in or register an account first.
complete all required fields: Please complete all required fields (marked with *).
need review-url: We require a URL for this review.
need review-title: We require a title for this review.
need review-text: We require text for this review.
need review-rating: We require a rating for this review.
unexpected form data: We received unexpected data as part of your submission. This may be a coding error on our end, or on yours. Sorry for the inconvenience.
invalid star rating: The submitted rating, '%s', is not valid.
review title too long: The submitted review title is too long.
invalid language code: The submitted language code, '%s', is not valid or recognized.
captcha intro: Prove you're not a robot. What's the missing word indicated with ___?
question: famous painting: One of the world's most famous paintings is the Mona ___ by Leonardo da Vinci.
question: famous composer: Ludwig van ____ was almost totally deaf toward the end of his life.
question: famous scientist: Darwin helped formulate the Theory of Evolution. His first name was ____.
need captcha-answer: Please answer the challenge question to weed out automated spam.
incorrect captcha answer: Sorry, that's not the right answer to the challenge question. If you're unsure, you may want to use a search engine.
invalid url: The URL does not appear to be valid. Note that we can't guess the protocol prefix for you (typically http:// or https://).
thing not found text: We did not find a thing with the specified address, '%s'. Perhaps it has been deleted?
review not found text: We did not find a review with the specified address, '%s'. Perhaps it has been deleted?
permission error: You do not have permission to perform this action.
report an error: We log all errors of this kind, but you can help us out by reporting what you did when you got this error. You can file an issue on GitHub and we'll look into it, promise!
error details: Please include the following in your report:
